#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll arr[1000010];
ll bum[1000010];
int main()
{
	ll t,n,i,a;
	std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		
		ll k1=0;
		ll k2=0;
		ll flag=0;
		ll flag1=0;
		ll flag3=0;
		unsigned long long sum=1;
		unsigned long long sum1=1;
		ll count=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a;
			
			if(a<0)
			{
				arr[k1++]=a;
				sum1=(-a)*sum1;
				if(sum1>=mod)
				{
					sum1%=mod;
				}
				ll flag1=1;
				count+=1;
			}
			if(a==0)
			{
				flag3=1;
			}
			else if(a>0)
			{
				sum=sum*a;
				if(sum>=mod)
				{
					sum%=mod;
				}
				flag=1;
				//brr[k2++]=a;
			}
		}
		if(flag==0 && count==1)
		{
			if(flag3==0)
			{
				cout<<(arr[0]+mod)<<endl;
			}
			else
			{
				cout<<"0"<<endl;
				
				
			}
		}
		else if(flag==0 && count==0)
		{
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
		
		unsigned long long ans;
		if(!(k1&1))
		{
			ans=(sum1*sum)%mod;
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			unsigned long long sum2=1;
			sort(arr,arr+k1);
			for(i=0;i<k1-1;i++)
			{
				sum2=sum2*(-arr[i]);
				if(sum2>=mod)
				{
					sum2%=mod;
				}
			}
			ans=(sum*sum2)%mod;
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
		}
		
	}
	return 0;

	
}
